etymology.description: Depicts a left hand -> stylized as 又(yòu, 'again') flipped -> used as a component in 灰(灰) (huī, 'ash')
etymology.interpretation: The character 𠂇 is a pictogram that represents a left hand and is a variant of the component 又(yòu, 'again') when flipped. This depiction is used visually in other characters, such as 灰(灰) (huī, 'ash'), where the left hand form can be identified.
